lead_paragraph: Ljupko Petrovic, who coached Red Star Belgrade to European Cup final glory in 1991, quit unbeaten Bulgarian leaders Levski Sofia an hour before their match against Beroe Stara Zagora on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Angry Petrovic Quits Unbeaten Bulgarian Leaders Levski
headline.main: Angry Petrovic Quits Unbeaten Bulgarian Leaders Levski

snippet: Ljupko Petrovic, who coached Red Star Belgrade to European Cup final glory in 1991, quit unbeaten Bulgarian leaders Levski Sofia an hour before their match against Beroe Stara Zagora on Saturday....
